subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa left Annika Sorenstam and everyone else behind at the HSBC Women’s Champions in Singapore, but she was at a loss for words to explain how she had done it.
snippet: Lorena Ochoa left Annika Sorenstam and everyone else behind at the HSBC Women’s Champions in Singapore, but she was at a loss for words to explain how she had done it.
